MouseEvent Class Reference

An instance of this class represents a mouse movement event. More...

Detailed Description

An instance of this class represents a mouse movement event.

Member Function Documentation

Vector2 MouseEvent::cursorPosition (  )  const [inline]

Returns the position of the mouse cursor at the time this event occured.

It is in the clip-space of the client window.

long MouseEvent::dx (  )  const [inline]

This method returns the amount the mouse has moved along the x-axis during this event.

long MouseEvent::dy (  )  const [inline]

This method returns the amount the mouse has moved along the y-axis during this event.

long MouseEvent::dz (  )  const [inline]

This method returns the amount the mouse has moved along the z-axis during this event.

The z-axis corresponds to the mouse wheel.

long  dy,
